name: Spinferno: Ouya & Android Edition
blurb: Spinferno for Ouya & Android is a crazy mash-up of Dante's Inferno, voodoo magic and pinball. Make your own characters, levels & more!

rewards.reward: LIST OF THE CONDEMNED: We are extremely grateful for your help in making Spinferno happen! Your name will be listed in the game's about section, in a special area called "List of the Condemned!"
PURGATORY: Get a free "Unlock to Full Game" of  Spinferno Demo for the platform of your choice. You made the game happen, the least we can do is give it to you! Plus all the previous.
VESTIBULE: For your torturing pleasure, you'll get the exclusive Overweight Bearded Internet Critic character-type! Only available to Spinferno backers of $15 and above!

LIMBO: Digital download of the Spinferno Paper Doll Super Hell Playset, complete with Wheel of Doom, character bodies, weapons, flippers & more! Plus the earlier levels, minus limitations, including stipulations.

LUST: A beautifully printed Spinferno Paper Doll Super Hell Playset! Hours of fun creating your own Spinferno levels! Plus the earlier levels, minus limitations, including stipulations. Shipping rates may apply.

GLUTTONY:  A beautiful Spinferno Poster with art by the Rocksauce Studios team, perfect for framing or taping to your wall! You'll also receive access to digital copies to use as wallpaper on all your favorite devices. Plus the earlier levels, minus limitations, including stipulations. Shipping rates may apply.

POLITIK: Your choice of "Vote Obama..." or "Vote Romney..." Straight to Hell! t-shirt, plus exclusive access to torture the winner of the 2012 election in the game! Not for the faint of heart! Oh, and you'll get your shirt in plenty of time for showing off this fall! Plus the earlier levels, minus limitations, including stipulations. Shipping rates may apply.

GREED: For the non-political, get a Spinferno T-Shirt with Spinerno art on the front and back! We'll ask your size later. Plus the earlier levels, minus limitations, including stipulations. Shipping rates may apply.

RIVER STYX: Get the freakin' awesome Spinferno Fridge Magnet River Styx Playset! A step-up from the Paper Doll Super Hell Playset, you'll receive a set of bodies, tortures, demons & more to arrange over and over on your home or office fridge! Plus the earlier levels, minus limitations, pick your shirt level. Shipping rates may apply.

DER F\u00dcHRER: Get a super special exclusive Adolf Hitler torture doll, custom designed for backers of $225 or more! Great for hours of guilt-free sadistic pleasure! Plus the earlier levels, minus limitations, including stipulations. Shipping rates may apply.

BETA BACKER: You get a Beta Seat for Spinferno! Provide feedback on features, how it works on your device, and more! Plus the earlier levels, minus limitations, including stipulations. Shipping rates may apply.

ANGER: We'll give you the crazy-cool retro Limited Edition Spinferno Coloring Book, signed & numbered by the Rocksauce Art team, featuring spots to paste or draw in the faces of your choosing! Plus the earlier levels, minus limitations, including stipulations. Shipping rates may apply.

HERESY: If you're choosing this level, you're just downright deviant. One person will have exclusive access to the Black Turtleneck Wearing CEO torture doll. Plus the earlier levels, minus limitations, including stipulations. Shipping rates may apply.

VIOLENCE: A custom illustration of YOU, Spinferno style! PLUS, have it appear next to your name in the "Special Damnations!" credit in Spinferno. Plus the earlier levels, minus limitations, including stipulations. Shipping rates may apply.

THE DITCH: We'll take that custom drawn avatar of yours and place it somewhere in the Spinferno game. You'll also get an invitation to the Spinferno Launch Party in Austin, Texas. You'll have to provide your own lodging & airfare, though. Plus the earlier levels, minus limitations, including stipulations. Shipping rates may apply.

THE ESCAPE: Your avatar will be an unlockable voodoo doll in the game! Plus your name gets featured in the special "Hellraisers" credits of the game. All your friends will be jealous, but hey, they can torture you to make themselves feel better! Plus the earlier levels, minus limitations, including stipulations. Shipping rates may apply.

GLORY: Come visit Rocksauce Studios for a day, sit down with the team and assist in concepting one of the Spinferno bosses! Oh, and you'll get a super special credit as a "Game Designer!" Awesome. Plus the earlier levels, minus limitations, including stipulations. Shipping rates may apply.
